title: Marketplace for Thursday October 30, 2014
byline: Stan Alcorn, Kate Davidson, Kai Ryssdal, D Gorenstein and Emily Guerin
description: We have seen progress in the workforce, which is increasingly diverse, but not in the c-suite. We look into the disparity between diversity in the workforce and the corner office. Plus, the world’s third largest-smartphone maker is now the Chinese consumer electronics firm Xiaomi, according to new data from IDC. The company got there by focusing on China and southeast asia. We introduce the company and its strategy.
